snippet.title: Edge Of Galaxy | Real-Time Tactical Space Sim With RPG Elements
snippet.description:
Edge of Galaxy is a real-time tactical space sim with RPG-lite elements. As the commander of a mercenary fleet, you must hire and manage your ships, upgrade their capabilities, and rise through the ranks to become a legend among mercs.

🎁Wishlist today so you don't miss the next sale!
Epic Games Store➡️https://bit.ly/Edge-Of-Galaxy-Epic
Steam➡️https://bit.ly/Edge-Of-Galaxy-Steam
GOG➡️https://bit.ly/Edge-Of-Galaxy-GOG

Join the ranks of the most skilled mercs in the galaxy with Edge of Galaxy, a real-time tactical space sim with RPG-lite elements. As the commander of your own fleet, you must hire and manage your ships, upgrade their capabilities, and conquer the stars to rise through the ranks and become a legend. With a rich and immersive universe to explore, a deep and engaging combat system, and endless opportunities for customization and progression, Edge of Galaxy offers endless hours of excitement and enjoyment. Join the ranks of the elite and try Edge of Galaxy today!

✅Indirect control adds a new layer of strategy and encourages strategic thinking
✅Advanced weapon and module system allows for customizable spaceships
✅5 playable factions, each with unique traits and abilities
✅Experience and ranks earned in battle can be used to improve and fine-tune ships
✅5 different campaigns to choose from, offering a variety of gameplay experiences
✅Explore game mode with small maps offers a more relaxed, exploratory experience
✅One-life mode with randomly generated world offers unique gameplay each time
✅Text quests offer multiple paths to completion depending on fleet and commander parameters
✅A rich and immersive universe to explore, filled with interesting characters and locations
✅Endless opportunities for customization and progression, allowing players to truly make the game their own
